content: The `Form` component is a container for input elements. When labeled with `aria-label` or `aria-labelledby`, it becomes a navigable landmark for assistive technology.
The `Form` component supports native HTML validation and server-side validation. Server errors can be passed via the `validationErrors` prop, which maps field names to error messages.

The default validation behavior is `native`. This can be changed to `aria`, which shows real-time errors without blocking submission. This can be set on the `Form` or globally in the `HeroUIProvider`.
